name: Dept. of Zombie Control and Elimination Introductory Nylon Bag
description:
The $15 Introductory Bag includes these items:

---Nylon Bag - 
Drawstring Shoulder Pack
Size: 14"w x 18"h
Features:
210-denier nylon polyurethane
black cord drawstring
chrome metal hardware.
---Unmarked Map - Details the Safe, Destroyed, and Over-Run Areas.
---Brochure - Includes a brochure on how to survive in the zombie apocalypse, what you need, and what to do and to do.
---D.Z.C.E Medical Kit - Comes with (2) Bandages and (1) Gauze Pad
---High Density Energy Supplement - (2) packs of Candy Corn
---Syringe Pen - A pen that looks like a syringe and comes in an assortment of randomly chosen colors.
---Lantern/Flashlight - A 4" lantern and flashlight combination that comes in an assortment of randomly chosen colors.
---Zombie Tonic - Marshmallow scented hand sanitizer

For every bag sold $1 will be donated to Child's Play Charity (http://www.childsplaycharity.org/)

(Please note, the picture shows a round bumper sticker, this bag does not contain a bumper sticker)

name: Dept. of Zombie Control and Elimination Trucker Hat
description:
Get the DZCE "One-Size-Fits-Most" Trucker. The Garment Wash gives it the look of being on a 1000 elimination missions.

For every hat sold $1 will be donated to Child's Play Charity (http://www.childsplaycharity.org/)
